verses.verse: As the deer <S%H354><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> after the water <S%H4325><s%> brooks <S%H650><s%>, so pants <S%H6165><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> after you <S%H430><s%>, O God.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for God <S%H430><s%>, for the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%>: when shall I come <S%H935><s%> and appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>?
My tears <S%H1832><s%> have been my food <S%H3899><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, while they continually <S%H3117><s%> say <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H430><s%>, Where is your God?

When I remember <S%H2142><s%> these things <S%H8210><s%>, I pour out my soul <S%H5315><s%> in me <S%H5674><s%>: for I had gone with the multitude <S%H5519><s%>, I went <S%H1718><s%> with them to the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H7440><s%> and praise <S%H8426><s%>, with a multitude <S%H1995><s%> that kept holyday <S%H2287><s%>.

Why are you cast down <S%H7817><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? and why are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> in me <S%H3176><s%>? hope you in God <S%H430><s%>: for I shall yet praise <S%H3034><s%> him for the help <S%H3444><s%> of his favor <S%H6440><s%>.

O my God <S%H430><s%>, my soul <S%H5315><s%> is cast down <S%H7817><s%> inside me <S%H2142><s%>: therefore will I remember you from the land <S%H776><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and of the Hermonites <S%H2769><s%>, from the hill <S%H2022><s%> Mizar <S%H4706><s%>.

Deep <S%H8415><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> unto deep <S%H8415><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of your waterspouts <S%H6794><s%>: all your waves <S%H4867><s%> and your billows <S%H1530><s%> are gone over me <S%H5674><s%>.

Yet the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%>, and in the night <S%H3915><s%> his song <S%H7892><s%> shall be with me <S%H8605><s%>, and my prayer unto the God <S%H410><s%> of my life <S%H2416><s%>.

I will say <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%> my rock <S%H5553><s%>, Why have you forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me <S%H3212><s%>? why go I mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>?
As with a sword <S%H7524><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%>, my enemies <S%H6887><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me <S%H559><s%>; while they say daily <S%H3117><s%> unto me <S%H430><s%>, Where is your God?

Why are you cast down <S%H7817><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? and why are you disquieted <S%H1993><s%> inside me <S%H3176><s%>? hope you in God <S%H430><s%>: for I shall yet praise <S%H3034><s%> him <S%H3444><s%>, who is the health of my favor <S%H6440><s%>, and my God <S%H430><s%>.
